attributes.action: Discuss having to pay  fees when making an amendment to an insurance policy.
attributes.additional_details: How can they justify £25 to to remove a named driver etc. They sit on a computer and it does it all for them.No letters to send out its by email now.
attributes.background: Insurance companies should not charge fees for making charges to a policy. It's a rip off we already pay enough in premiums.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
